text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Morocco on verge of major political changes with referendum on constitutional reform.
- Banana production dropped as consequence of GATT accord and lack of competitiveness on local market.
- Moroccan delegation heads for Libya to attend session of the executive council for African parliaments.
- Morocco and Belgium seek ways to expand cooperation in telecommunications and transport.
- Police arrests three French nationals and seven Moroccans on drug trafficking charges in Tangier.
